actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
    s.id,
    s.date,
    s.faccode,
    s.shcode,
    s.`custom code`,
    s.`Product code`,
    s.`Piece-qtn`,
    s.`rmb`,
    s.print,
    s.`note`,
    s.`shop`,
    c.name AS fac_name,
    m.code
FROM
    `2020`.`mayastock-in` s
LEFT JOIN `2020`.`kaddname` c ON s.`faccode` = c.code
LEFT JOIN `2020`.`model` m ON s.`Product code` = m.dcode
WHERE
    s.shcode = 218666
    AND s.shop = 'pycm-im'
    -- AND s.faccode != 0
    AND s.`Product code` NOT IN (17797, 7140, 0)  -- เอารหัสนี้ออกไป
ORDER BY
    s.id DESC
LIMIT 3000;
